page.title: 10THE GARAGE IN BROUGHTON
page.content: WE WENT TO BROUGHTON MOTORS LTD.AND INTERVIEWED A CAR SALES MANAGER.HE SELLS NEW AND USED CARS.HE THINKS HIS JOB IS GREAT BECAUSE HE LIKES PEOPLE AND HE LIKES WORKING FREELY.HIS WORKING HOURS VARY FROM DAY TO DAY.THE DEAREST NEW CARS HE SELLS ARE LANCIA WHICH ARE ITALIAN.HE ALSO SELLS MITSUBUSHI WHICH ARE JAPANESE.THE PRICES FOR THE NEW CARS VARY FROM 4,500 POUNDS TO 13,500 POUNDS.HE SAYS THAT ENGINE SIZES ARE APPROXIMATELY SMALL:UP TO 1300cc. MEDIUM:1300-2000cc. LARGE:2000cc OR MORE. THE MOST POPULAR CARS ARE MEDIUM SIZED HATCH-BACKS.THE CO-OP OWN BROUGHTON MOTORS LTD.BUT FINA OWN THE PETROL SALES AND SWEETS PART.ABOUT TWO HUNDRED PEOPLE BUY PETROL DAILY AT AN AVERAGE OF THREE GALLONS EACH.
